TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE in the GPE region . She was represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE . The respondent Government were represented by Mr P. A. GPE , the representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
The applicant was an employee of a joint - stock company . In DATE , as a result of an internal audit , she was suspected of fraud .
On DATE criminal proceedings were brought against her .
On DATE the applicant 's employer dismissed her on the ground of loss of confidence in her .
In DATE the applicant lodged a civil action with ORG of GPE against her former employer , claiming reinstatement and damages .
On DATE the court stayed the proceedings pending the outcome of the criminal case against the applicant .
On DATE the court examined the applicant 's claims and rejected them in full .
On DATE the applicant was charged with fraud .
On DATE ORG upheld the judgment in the civil case .
On DATE the investigating authority transferred the applicant 's criminal case to the court .

On DATE ORG of GPE examined the case and terminated the applicant 's prosecution for lack of evidence . The applicant , who disagreed with the grounds for termination of her prosecution , appealed . On DATE ORG granted her appeal and quashed the decision .

On DATE the ORG of the Krasnodar Region discontinued the criminal proceedings against the applicant for want of a crime , having regard to the fact that the prosecution refused to press charges against her .
